chain_of_thought: [Article Type: Case Report] In this article, I found the following liver injury-related lab values and clinical outcomes: The patient is a 22-year-old male with suspected MDMA-induced liver injury. From the text and Table 1, peak ALT is 3310 U/L on Day 3, peak AST is 3623 U/L on Day 3, peak ALP is not mentioned, peak GGT is not mentioned, peak bilirubin is 7.84 mg/dL (total bilirubin) on Day 5, peak INR is 4.1, and albumin is not mentioned. The clinical outcome is liver transplantation followed by improvement, so it should be 'Liver Transplantation'.
